title: Pixel2 won't charge, red dot light is on
content: The battery sign showed that the device is being charged even when the charger was not connected. It was connected to the charger all night and the phone was 16% charged in the morning, battery got to 2% and I tried to master reset by shutting down the device and  long pressing volume down button. now I can turn on the phone and a red light is on at the top right corner.
